metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20840 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/ws_decode.c can lead to a crash because of unaligned accesses in hybiReadAndDecode.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20840` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
veyon package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
x11vnc package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
